About This Property
Gorgeous 2nd floor apartment is in a multi family house. Hardwood floors throughout. Updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops. LAUNDRY IN UNIT! Off street parking for 2 cars. Good sized bedrooms. Apartment gets great natural light. Stunning location, easy access to the Arsenal Mall and all the stores, shops and restaurants. Short walk to the 70 & 70A MBTA bus. Easy access to Watertown Square. Availability is for September 1, 2023. Sorry NO pets!
